long_prompt: A smooth, white towel draped over a sleek, curved vertical diagonal taco stand in a modern restaurant kitchen, with soft ambient lighting casting gentle shadows on the pristine surfaces.

A smooth, white towel draped over a wooden bench, its folds and wrinkles catching the soft morning light as it rests beside a row of neatly stacked, curved, vertical, and diagonal tacos on a wooden countertop in a rustic kitchen.

A smooth, white towel draped over a wooden drying rack, next to a set of perfectly curved, vertically-oriented tacos with golden fillings spilling out, placed on a rustic wooden table in a cozy kitchen.
